entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IEntityTypeConfiguration<T> defined on a record DB model type does not seem to be picked up or applied during model building #31993
  • Changing the result after reader executed in a DbCommandInterceptor #31991
  • Query: when navigating from dependent to principal to another dependent we can skip the principal table and just compare FKs on the dependent tables in some cases #31989

Closed

  • Nested Inserts #31987

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Open the connection before creating the DbCommand #31988
    Servicing-consider

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Treat SQL Pool warmup/pause errors as transient #31739
    Servicing-consider, community-contribution
